# NSWritingDirection.natural

**Case**

The writing direction of the current script that the system determines using the Unicode Bidi Algorithm rules P2 and P3.

## Declaration

```swift
case natural
```

## Discussion

This is the default writing direction.

## Constants

- **NSWritingDirection.leftToRight**: The writing direction is left to right.
- **NSWritingDirection.rightToLeft**: The writing direction is right to left.

items.description: The writing direction is left to right.
items.name: NSWritingDirection.leftToRight

items.description: The writing direction is right to left.
items.name: NSWritingDirection.rightToLeft
